On Sep 21, 2009, at 10:08 AM, Bill Burke wrote:

> One thing I didn't understand from the Link header draft was "rel"  
> vs. "rev", outbound vs. inbound.

AFAIR, this was not there originally, and was only added because HTML  
has it. As the draft says, "its use is not encouraged nor defined by  
this specification".

Subbu
